subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Levi Leipheimer won the first stage of the USA Pro Cycling Challenge in Colorado by seven seconds, pedaling away from the lead group with 500 yards left in the 99.3-mile stage from Salida to Crested Butte.
snippet: Levi Leipheimer won the first stage of the USA Pro Cycling Challenge in Colorado by seven seconds, pedaling away from the lead group with 500 yards left in the 99.3-mile stage from Salida to Crested Butte.
